word:
Keep of good courage, Sister Olsen. Have faith. Look up always to the face of Jesus, and see and sense His love. A great work will be done for you, if you will only believe. Our Lord will lead you if you have faith in the high platform of truth. May the Lord bless and sanctify you both, soul, body, and spirit, is my prayer.--Letter 252, 1906. 











Ellen G. White Estate 
Silver Spring, Maryland 
October 25, 1990. Entire Letter.
